titles.title: Supporting the designation of July 11, 2020, as "Antique Motorcycle Enthusiast Day" and recognizing the preservation, restoration, and operation of old-time motorcycles in the United States.
Supporting the designation of July 11, 2020, as "Antique Motorcycle Enthusiast Day" and recognizing the preservation, restoration, and operation of old-time motorcycles in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
This resolution
supports the designation of Antique Motorcycle Enthusiast Day, recognizes the effect of the history of the American motorcycle and the economic surge that celebrated over 120 American brands in the first half of the 20th Century, and recognizes that the collection and restoration of vintage and classic motorcycles is an important part of preserving the technological achievements and cultural heritage of the United States.
